Let me tell you something. Can you guess
what I am going to say? Please pay me
without further baaing. I’ve had enough
of your ba-a. (HOLDING OUT HAND) Pay
me quickJ (CIRCLE BENCH)

this the most you intend to do? Upon
my oath, you shall pay me, unless you
can flyl Do you understand? HereS
